sections.starterCode:
# Example: Simple To-Do App
todos = []
while True:
    task = input('Task (or quit): ')
    if task == 'quit':
        break
    todos.append(task)
print(todos)
sections.explainMarkdown: This integrates loops, lists, and input handling.
